page.title: 11OLD PEOPLE; ABBEY WOOD
page.content: There is an old people'S home across the road in Felixtowe Rd and my mum works over there as well. I have been over there and it is a bit spooky because when you walk past the old people they stare at you until you disap out of the front door. My mum tells me quite a bit about the old people's home and when I do go over there I usually help my mum, but only with her ladies. You see every person who works there has their own three or four ladies if they are women or three or four men if they are gentlemen. I serve out the dinners and clean up as well.
